item.title: Selecting a tool for a managing blogsite
item.author: Murthy Udupa
item.description: Using Grok3 to select a static website generator

item.title: SpeechTrack
item.author: Murthy Udupa
item.description:
What I Built

SpeechTrack is a AI based App built as a part of submission to a dev-challenge sponsored by AssemblyAI

SpeechTrack

Getting a deeper understanding of speech with AssemblyAI Ever wondered how your speech sounds to others? Clarity and speed are the heartbeat of effective communication, but striking the perfect balance can be a challenge.

Enter SpeechTrack, your real-time speech companion. With intuitive visual indicators for Clarity and Tempo, SpeechTrack empowers you to refine your delivery through post speech Feedback.

item.title: Github Stats on your Github profile page
item.author: Murthy Udupa
item.description: Ever wondered how some GitHub profiles stand out with dynamic stats, vibrant visuals, and an interactive feel? Welcome to the art of creating a dynamic GitHub profile page! In this post, we’ll dive into showcasing your coding prowess through GitHub statistics to turn your profile into a living resume of your coding journey. Let’s make your GitHub profile not just a page, but an experience.

item.title: Using shortcodes in Hugo
item.author: Murthy Udupa
item.description:
Hugo has built-in shortcodes and LoveIt Theme extends the shortcodes to do more. Here are some examples of both.

Details

Details allow you to expand some text below a given summary text

See the details

This is a bold world.This is a bold world. Don’t tread lightly out here as there will be some nefarious character who could ambush you and that wont go well. So beware!
